name: Hidden Boxes
description:
Hidden Boxes is a classic prop hunt game where seekers try to find props before time runs out. Matches can accommodate up to eight players, offering multiple customizable match settings for players to choose from.



  • Trying to hide as best they can and avoid being seen by the seekers.
  • Two special abilities: whistle and invisibility.
  • Physical-based movement is enabled for props, making it easier for them to blend into the world.



  • Seekers are trying to find all the props on the map before the timer runs out.
  • Magical balloon weapon in the fingers.
  • Seekers can also deploy an optional scan effect that scans a small area around them to help find props more easily.



Hidden Boxes currently has five different maps, each with distinct themes and props.
